name: mikroe.click.barometer13
short_description: Barometer 13 Click is a compact add-on board that measures air pressure in a specific environment. This board features the BMP585, a barometric pressure sensor from Bosch Sensortec. It has a nominal operating pressure range of 30 up to 125kPa and a temperature operating range from -40 to +85Â°C. The sensor provides true absolute pressure and temperature readings due to on-chip linearization and temperature compensation.
